page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: Approaching{Peterhead,}you will pass Peterhead{Power Station.}Then you will see{Meethill Tower}with{H.M.Prison}and {A.S.C.O.Base }on the right.The South Road leads past the {Lido Beach} towards the town centre.You will see the{Breakwaters}which were built by prisoners to shelter ships.Peterhead's {bay}is good for fishing and watersports.The good thing about this beach is the cafe on the Lido. The {Lifeboat Service}in Peterhead gives a very secure feeling to swimmers and sailors.Tucked far behind the houses and to the left of the South Road you will find{Clerkhill shopping {area.}Further South in our area you will find an excellent primary school called{Meethill. {
